title: Introducing the Garbage Crime Movie Oscars. Plus: Brandon Cronenberg!
description:
Things are quiet in the world of movies, so we’re taking a moment to celebrate one of our favorite subgenres: GARBAGE CRIME. What’s that? Allow chief criminologist Chris Ryan to break it all down and hand out some awards to the very best the subgenre has to offer. (1:00) Then, Sean is joined by writer-director Brandon Cronenberg to talk about his viscerally overwhelming new film, ‘Possessor.’ (1:05:00)
Host: Sean Fennessey
Guests: Chris Ryan and Brandon Cronenberg
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
